document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9064a8">Pausing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">against </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">our </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9064a8">palsied </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Faces </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Time's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">decision </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">shook </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: We talked with each other about each other
